page.title: 13Lane Farm.
page.content: of the industry. During the past ten years the nature of Lane Farm has changed completely.The farm which was originally a mixed arable farm is now given over totally to cereal crops.With a large acreage Mr.Trevor felt,with common market subsidies and quotas so uncertain,that cereal farming held the most promise for the future.So far he is the only farmer within our block to change over so completely.As a result of the change the size of some of his fields has increased,and some of the hedges have been taken up.With the world changing so quickly such minor alterations seem inevitable,and Mr.Trevor can perhaps best be described as a practical conservationist.He has planted numerous trees and hedges,and has converted a useless 2 acres into a
